page.title: 12ARTS AND CRAFTS (CONTINUED)
page.content:
She first came to our school and showed us how to spin.She has her own wheel and makes either thick or thin wool then she knits it into sweaters to sell.You can dye the wool by putting in special berries and plants.We have a man who carves {statues}out of stone for churches.He has mended the spire on Fairford church.As well as{sculptoring,}he paints in oils.He has lots of {paintings}which he sells.A lady who lives in the village draws houses and then she{embroiders}then on canvas, it takes four months to do two. She sells them at the Market at Swindon. She also does{paintings}of cottages sells them to the owners.
A lady makes childrens clothes with
